        public static void checkMainThread()

      • getRealCurrentCoordinate

        @Nullable
public static com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.geometry.LatLng getRealCurrentCoordinate(android.content.Context context)
        A helper method to get the current location of the user, using the same technique used throughout the SDK. This method will always attempt to return real current location of the device in use, even if a simulated one is provided elsewhere
        Parameters:
        context - context to check location
        Returns:
        a LatLng of the user's current location

      • isServiceRunning

        public static boolean isServiceRunning(@NonNull
                                       android.content.Context context,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.Class<?> serviceClass)
        Helper method to check if a service is running
        Parameters:
        context - the context to check if service is running
        serviceClass - the service class to check
        Returns:
        true if service is running, false if not

                                                     com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.geometry.LatLng center)
